Hero.description: This is my personal space and freelance hub, focused primarily on Frontend Development and designing clean, maintainable, and scalable architectures. While capable of Backend integration as needed, I specialize in UI, UX, and architectural precision.
Hero.feature_1_desc: Designing systems before writing code, ensuring every decision supports long-term growth rather than just quick fixes.
Hero.feature_2_desc: Architectures built for speed from day one, reducing technical debt and systematically enhancing user experience.
Hero.feature_3_desc: Collaborating with teams as a strategic partner, not just a developer, to help shape the overall product direction.

Services.title: How We Can Collaborate
Services.description: My services focus primarily on the Frontend, from designing new system architectures to optimizing existing systems for performance and sustainability.

item1.title: Frontend Architecture & Development
item1.description: Designing and developing Frontend architectures for digital products that require systemic clarity and long-term flexibility, choosing technologies suitable for the context, not just trends.

item2.title: Legacy Frontend Refactoring

item3.title: API Integration & Frontend Automation

Work.title: Work & Projects Experience
Work.description: Projects I have co-developed and driven within professional contexts, ranging from laying new system foundations to optimizing and expanding existing platforms. Emphasis is placed on clear structure, stability, and user experience.

p1.title: Online Ticket Booking Platform
p1.challenge: Built an online booking system from scratch, requiring production-readiness, payments, and real-time data management.
p1.solution: Developed the frontend using React and Next.js, utilized TailwindCSS for the UI system, and integrated Firebase along with API Integration for a comprehensive booking workflow.
p1.result: System deployed to production, successfully handling ticket bookings and user operations.

p2.title: Website Platform (Admin + Main Site)
p2.challenge: Developed a website platform from scratch, designing both the administrator (Admin) and main user-facing sites with clear structures for future scalability.
p2.solution: Built the frontend using Nuxt.js and SCSS, connected to a Laravel API, and designed a systematic component and state management structure for Admin and Main Web synchronization.
p2.result: Production-ready system capable of feature expansion without excessive complexity.

p3.title: B2B E-Commerce Platform
p3.challenge: Developed a B2B e-commerce website focused on product data clarity and an optimal user experience for corporate clients.
p3.solution: Developed the frontend with Nuxt.js connected to a Laravel API, organizing product displays and checkout processes for ease of use.
p3.result: A business-oriented website seamlessly and stably connected to the backend system.

p4.title: Igetweb – Theme Customization Platform
p4.challenge: A website builder platform requiring continuous new theme designs, necessitating frontend development and customization that supports various designs without impacting the core architecture.
p4.solution: Developed and customized themes using PHP, CSS, and JavaScript, ensuring layout flexibility and compatibility with the existing system for continuous design rollouts.
p4.result: Enabled the team to launch new themes faster while maintaining platform stability standards.

About.para1: I believe that software development is more than just making websites work; it is about designing systems with a clear rationale behind every decision—from internal architecture to the user experience.
About.para2: Clarity of code, thoughtfully considered architecture, and flexibility for future changes are the standards I prioritize in every project. This ensures that systems not only perform today but can grow sustainably in the long term.
